full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Hoist, Crane, Man Lift, Fall Arrest Maintenance and Inspection Services

## Contract Information

* Title (English/French): Hoist, Cranes, Man Lifts, Fall Arrest Maintenance and Inspection / Entretien des systèmes hydrauliques de levage
* Reference Number: WS4058610640-Doc4058643652
* Solicitation Number: WS4058610640
* Publication Date: July 18, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

## Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: November 30, 2025
* UNSPSC Codes: 72101512, 72154502, 78141600 (Hoist construction service, Crane maintenance and repair service, Inspection)
* Trade Agreements: Eligible contractors must participate in the following trade agreements:
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contact Information

* Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Contract Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) - Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Greenwood is seeking a service provider to conduct inspection, testing, certification, and service of hydraulic, electric, and manual cranes, hoists, and lifting devices.

Please visit the following website to view the full tender notice:
<http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16907809?extsite=MTY5MDc4MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
